insert into sys_menu
menuName, menuUrl, `type`, parentCode, ifVisible, igEnabled, allowEdit, allowDelete, iconClass, `sequence`, creator, modifier, remark,
#{menuName}, #{menuUrl}, #{type}, #{parentCode}, #{ifVisible}, #{ifEnabled}, #{allowedit}, #{allowdelete}, #{iconClass}, #{sequence}, #{creator}, #{modifier}, #{remark},
mapper.delete: update sys_menu set ifEnabled = 0 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT srm.menuId FROM sys_role_menu srm INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur on sur.roleId = srm.roleId where sur.userId = #{id}
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE ifEnabled = 1 AND ifVisible = 1 AND type != 2 AND parentCode = #{parentCode} ORDER BY sequence

SELECT DISTINCT sm.menuUrl from sys_menu sm INNER JOIN sys_role_menu srm on srm.menuId =sm.id INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.roleId = srm.roleId WHERE sm.ifEnabled = 1 AND sm.ifVisible = 1 AND sm.type !=0 AND sm.menuUrl != '' AND sur.userId=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_menu WHERE ifEnabled = 1 AND ifVisible = 1 AND parentCode = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT sm.perms FROM sys_menu sm INNER JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON srm.menuId = sm.id INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.roleId = srm.roleId WHERE sm.ifEnabled = 1 AND sm.ifVisible = 1 AND sur.userId = #{id}
SELECT count(1) FROM sys_role_menu srm INNER JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = srm.roleId WHERE sr.ifEnabled = 1 AND sr.ifVisible = 1 AND srm.roleId != 1 AND srm.menuId = #{id}
SELECT DISTINCT menuId FROM sys_role_menu WHERE roleId = #{roleId}
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE ifEnabled = 1 AND ifVisible = 1 AND parentCode = #{parentCode} ORDER BY sequence
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE ifEnabled = 1 AND ifVisible = 1 AND type = #{type} ORDER BY sequence
